blur_detection.description: The receipt image shows clear, sharp text with well-defined edges and excellent focus quality.
blur_detection.recommendation: No action needed as the image focus quality is excellent for OCR processing.

contrast_assessment.description: The receipt exhibits excellent contrast between the dark text and light background making all content clearly readable.
contrast_assessment.recommendation: No adjustment needed as contrast is ideal for text recognition.

glare_identification.description: No visible glare, reflections, or overexposed areas are present on the receipt.
glare_identification.recommendation: Current lighting conditions are ideal; maintain similar environment for future document captures.

water_stains.description: No water damage, discoloration, or staining is visible on the receipt.
water_stains.recommendation: Continue keeping receipts dry and protected from liquid exposure.

tears_or_folds.description: The receipt appears to have a slight crease or fold mark, but it does not impact text legibility.
tears_or_folds.recommendation: While current folding doesn't impact readability, try to keep receipts flat when possible for optimal scanning.

cut_off_detection.description: The entire receipt is captured within the frame with no cut-off edges or missing content.
cut_off_detection.recommendation: Continue using this framing approach that captures the complete document.

missing_sections.description: The receipt appears complete with header, line items, totals, and footer information all present.
missing_sections.recommendation: Current capture method is excellent; continue ensuring all receipt sections are included.

obstructions.description: No fingers, shadows, or other obstructions block any part of the receipt content.
obstructions.recommendation: Current capture technique effectively avoids obstructions; maintain this approach.
